title: T206 PSA 5 Commons and McGraw PSA 4
author: jlynch1960

posts.post_title: T206 PSA 5 Commons and McGraw PSA 4
posts.post_content:
Hi-

Edited to add new commons.  Price on commons $90 each for two or more.  Make an offer (w/in reason) on the McGraw.  

McGraw No Cap PSA 4 - $175

Commons PSA 5  -$95 each
Krause portrait 
Phillippe P350
Seymour port SC 350-460
Thomas P350

Cards are nice and sharp with very good colors.  My scanner leaves a little to be desired.  Backs are good, but ask for a scan if you're the type who would ask to return a card because you didn't like the back.

Paypal add 3%, shipping included.  Thanks.  Jim

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=28762&d=1291846118[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=28765&d=1291846177[/IMG]

Jim,

PM sent on the Dougherty, Pfeister and Gilbert.  Thanks!  Craig
Dougherty, Pfeister and Gilbert sold to Craig from the Republic of California.
All cards listed are sold to Bill. Thanks!
